moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.effect: Never misses when the weather is rainy. Has a moderate chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.effect: Never misses during a hailstorm. Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

passives.name: Superduper Effective 1
passives.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.

passives.name: Unfortuitous 9
passives.description: Lowers the target’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness at random when an attack is successful.

passives.name: Oak’s Research
passives.description: Replaces some of the user’s moves with different moves after using a sync move.
